content.raw:
Hi @nkoenig! Thanks for your feedback! Yes I will definitely work towards bringing this to reality. Though, do you mind to actually give some initial guidance and references on the API of where I should look into to actually make this possible? That would boost my development and would put me on the right track without having to dig into parts of the API which are not actually required.

Thank you very much for that!
